Text:
Game works.  Just install and play - already cracked (Win7).

Notes:
- seems to be poorly optimised, fps -wise
- no local multiplayer or LAN
- comical Arnie commentary option
- visuals are nice-ish
- HDD hog (6.2Ggb)

Verdict:
5.5/10. Download Split/Second instead.
You can play in LAN by using dedicated server. However I am having problems with gamepad, it won't correctly listen to buttons.
cool man.....this game is fuckin awesome....but in the starting u really need to work on with ur skills.....once ur good in that , u'll really enjoy this game....works fine in my pc....
